validation.sameLanguageError: Native language and default learning language must be different

withdrawal.title: Confirm Account Deletion
withdrawal.message:
Are you sure you want to delete your account?

This action will permanently delete all of the following data:
• User information
• Created phrases
• Speaking history
• Quiz results
• Situations

This action cannot be undone.
withdrawal.emailConfirmLabel: Please enter your registered email address to confirm
withdrawal.success: Account deleted successfully. You will be redirected to the login page.
withdrawal.error: Failed to delete account. Please try again later.
withdrawal.emailMismatch: The entered email address does not match the registered email address

resetTime.title: Reset Time
resetTime.description:
Daily reset at UTC 0:00
• Japan： 9:00 AM
• US East Coast： 8:00/7:00 PM
• US West Coast： 5:00/4:00 PM
※ DST/Standard Time

dailyLimit.title: Daily Usage Limit
dailyLimit.description: You can use the phrase generation feature up to 5 times per day. Let's steadily build up 5 phrases every day.

messages.dailyLimitReached: You have reached the daily limit of 100 speaks. Please try again tomorrow!
messages.countError: Error occurred while updating speak count
messages.phraseCountFetchFailedEmpty: Failed to fetch phrase count (empty response)
messages.noPracticeablePhrases: No phrases available to practice in this mode
messages.phraseCountCheckError: Error occurred while checking phrase count

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.description: Read the displayed phrases aloud and press the count button each time you practice to record your practice count.

goals.title: Goals and Practice Count
goals.description: Aim to practice reading aloud 10 times a day. We recommend reading each phrase aloud at least 50 times. Through consistent and repetitive practice, phrases will naturally come out of your mouth.

effectiveMethods.title: Effective Practice Methods
effectiveMethods.naturalSpeed: Repeat until you can read at natural speed
effectiveMethods.understanding: Practice while understanding the meaning of phrases
effectiveMethods.pronunciation: Imagine using phrases in real situations

features.quizFunction: Test your quick response with quiz features

speechRecognition.title: Want to practice speaking using AI but don't know how to utilize it effectively

quiz.title: You've learned vocabulary and grammar, but nothing comes out when speaking

progress.title: Phrases you couldn't say - you think you should review them but end up leaving them untouched

feature1.title: AI instantly generates "phrases you couldn't say"
feature1.description: AI translates phrases you couldn't express into natural expressions. Since it's based on phrases you actually couldn't say, more practical learning is possible.

demo.input: How long have you been living in Japan?
outputs: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
日本に住んで何年になりますか？
日本にいらしてどのくらいになりますか？

feature2.title:
Reading count feature for
thorough support "until you can speak"
feature2.description: Simply "knowing" a language isn't enough to speak it. Aim for 10 readings per day and a total of 50 readings per phrase until it comes out naturally from your mouth.

demo.input: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
demo.output: How long have you been living in Japan?

feature3.title:
Check your "quick response"
with quiz features
feature3.description: Can phrases memorized through reading practice actually be used in real conversations? Use the quiz feature to instantly respond with memorized phrases, completing the memory → repetition → practice cycle.

demo.input: 日本にはどのぐらい住んでいるの？
demo.output: How long have you been living in Japan?

q1.question: Is there a limit to phrase generation?
q1.answer: You can use it up to 5 times per day.
q1.answerDetail: Let's steadily build up 5 phrases every day.

q2.question: When does the phrase generation count reset?
q2.answer: It resets at 0:00 UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).
q2.answerDetail: In Japan Standard Time, it resets at 9:00 AM (winter time) or 8:00 AM (summer time). In Vancouver time, it resets at 4:00 PM (winter time) or 5:00 PM (summer time).

q3.question: Is Solo Speak free to use?
q3.answer: Basic features are currently available for free.
q3.answerDetail: We may introduce paid features in the future as we expand our services, but we will notify you in advance.

cta.title:
Start your speaking practice
right now
cta.subtitle: Take your language learning to the next level with Solo Speak

subscription.subscriptionRequired: Basic Plan subscription required to use AI phrase generation
subscription.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will lose access to AI phrase generation immediately.

addToHomeScreen.title: Easy access from your home screen!
addToHomeScreen.description: You can add this to your smartphone’s home screen and use it like an app!

safari.step2: Tap the share button at the bottom
safari.step4: Confirm the app name and tap 'Add'

android.step2: Tap the menu button (three dots) at the top right
android.step3: Tap 'Add to Home Screen' or 'Install App'
android.step4: Confirm the app name and tap 'Add'
